entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 4.
